derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting the divine nature of God): from Old French deite, from ecclesiastical Latin deitas (translating Greek theotēs), from deus 'god'

entry.def: A deity is a god or goddess.

means.word_mean: 1. any supernatural being worshipped as controlling some part of the world or some aspect of life or who is the personification of a force
